channel.title: Gpio/out/pwm t3 disables PA6 and PA7 as input
channel.description:
Hi,
I am trying to drive two LEDs with gpio/out/pwm t3 object using PB0 and PB1, but when I have object on my patch I cannot use the other pins that appears here (PA6 and PA7).
If I delete the object I recovery again PA6 an PA7.
Is the any object to use only PB0 and PB1 as output or can I customize gpio/out/pwm t3?
It is the first time that I am using GPIOs as output so it is possible I am missing something.
Thanks in advance
